chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has the following issue.
Thank you,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for portable and household appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to make a refund if it proceeds.
The customer meets the following requirements for the return to be processed:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Confirms that they have deleted their personal data
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase receipt must be included in the return package
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.
Remember: Once delivered, the seller has 3 days (5 days for portable and household appliances) to repair or replace the article and 2 days to make a refund if necessary.

Hi, ecomobile:

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Oscar Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We are currently still processing the phone and we take note of the customer's request. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
